text: Dynamo Moscow () is a Russian professional ice hockey club based in Moscow. They are members of the Bobrov Division in the Kontinental Hockey League. ==Honours== ===Domestic competitions=== Soviet League Championship (5): 1946–47, 1953-54, 1989–90, 1990–91, 1991–92 USSR Cup (3): 1953, 1972, 1976 IHL Championship (3): 1992-93, 1994-95, 1995-96 IHL Cup (3): 1993, 1995, 1996 Russian Superleague (2): 1999-00, 2004-05 ===Kontinental Hockey League=== Gagarin Cup (2): 2011–12, 2012–13 Continental Cup (1): 2013–14 Opening Cup (3): 2010–11, 2012–13, 2013–14 ===Europe=== IIHF European Champions Cup (1): 2006 IIHF Continental Cup (1): 2004-05 Spengler Cup (2): 1983, 2008 Ahearne Cup (2): 1975, 1976 Tampere Cup (2): 1991, 1992 == Other websites == * Official website Category:Ice hockey teams in Russia Category:1946 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: HC Dynamo Moscow
